attributes.action: Create a Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Set up a new Department of Government Efficiency, look into fraud, get rid of expenditure if not required.
attributes.background: The Government wastes a lot of money on unnecessary things. I think each pound should be accounted for. Council Tax is increasing because of Councils spending ridiculous ammounts of money on useless things, also fraud is very likely on government contracts given out, as we know from Covid contracts.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Create the Department of Government Efficiency
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701630
